BARRYMORE




(The laser beams go by Barrymore, her left shoulder getting b=
urned by both of the beams. Barrymore growls and fires 5 laser beams at the=
 pod Axis hid behind. She starts to slowly approach the pod...)

  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: W=
ednesday, July 11, 2001 12:35 PM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  --- Lokk / Axis -=
--

  Lokk nods to Grounded, reaching the place directly behind the 
  enem=
y, and understanding the codeded message. He waves his 
  hand indicating t=
hat he is going to attack in three. He counts down, 
  and pulls guns out, =
aiming them at the bots, then stops. He 
  doesn't want anybody to get caug=
ht in the crossfire. Knowing that 
  he is not visible to the enemy, he sta=
rts to crawl to the nearst 
  mountain, which was right beside him. He gets=
 behind it, gets up 
  and runs up the mountain, opening a commlink to Grou=
nded, 
  "Trying to get higher so there is no crossfire." He keeps going.

=
  Axis still wondering where Lokk was, pulls his gun over the podd, 
  and =
fires two laser blasts at Barrymore, and the pulls back behind 
  the pod, =
his laser charging again. 


  On 8 Jul 2001, at 22:32, Jordan Guthrie wrot=
e:

  > Grounded popped out of the ground right behind Lokk.  He sent a com=
m
  > link.  "This is Grounded. Split the fork and choose a pea." he said
 =
 > hoping Lokk would understand his code.  He then went beside Lokk in
  > =
his mole form walking slowly and stealthly behind him.  Using
  > vibration=
s through the ground he determined within a few some odd
  > yards they wou=
ld be directly behind the enemy.

ct to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
